content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, FC Schalke 04 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, FC Schalke 04 0.

Offside, FC Schalke 04. Timo Hildebrand tries a through ball, but Ádám Szalai is caught offside.
Foul by Max Meyer (FC Schalke 04).
